paper_metadata.title: Mutational analysis of BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes in women with familial breast cancer from different regions of Colombia
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: This alteration was identified in a clinical case whose familial history reported prostate cancer and a second breast cancer case.

functional_data.summary: Predicted to be likely deleterious based on bioinformatics analysis.

variants.additional_notes: First report of this variant in the Colombian population.
key_quotes: This alteration was identified in a clinical case whose familial history reported prostate cancer and a second breast cancer case.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: This protein in its natural state presents 3,418 amino acids; this mutation causes a 74% loss of the entire protein, approximately 2,537 amino acids.
